name: ResampleImage
author: ANTs Developers
description: ResampleImage is a tool used to resample images to specified sizes and spacings, using various interpolation methods and pixel types.

inputs.name: Image Dimension
inputs.description: Dimension of the image to be resampled.

inputs.name: Input Image
inputs.description: The image file to be resampled.

inputs.name: Output Image
inputs.description: The output image file after resampling.

inputs.name: Size and Spacing
inputs.description: Resampling size and spacing specification, e.g., 'MxNxO'.

inputs.name: Interpolation Type
inputs.description: Specifies the interpolation type. 0: linear (default), 1: nearest-neighbor, 2: gaussian, 3: windowedSinc, 4: B-Spline.

inputs.name: Pixel Type
inputs.description: Specifies the pixel type of the output image. 0: char, 1: unsigned char, 2: short, 3: unsigned short, 4: int, 5: unsigned int, 6: float (default), 7: double.
